page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT RAFFORD AREA
page.content: The main employment for people in the area is farming.Rafford is a commuter village and many people travel to Forres,Kinloss and Elgin for their work.Many R.A.F. personnel have chosen to live in the area because it is quiet.Out of the people interviewed there were 12 who were unemployed and jobs in the area are hard to find. There are 7 members of the medical profession and 6 teachers among those interviewed.There are 7 shop workers. There are also 6 people who teach in local schools around Rafford.There are 2 people who are at university or college.They also found out that there were no shops in Rafford.
